name: Tap Golf Pro - Idle Game
description:
Do you like golf?
Are you a fan of idle games?
Tap Tap Golf Pro is for you!

• Earn $$$ and experience by hitting balls
• Become famous and earn more money with sponsors
• Train and improve your swing with plenty of golf clubs
• Compete against other golfers and prove your worth
• Improve your handicap through golf courses around the world
• Hire the best coaches around you to improve your skills and your earnings
